SELECT * FROM (
SELECT ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,FILENAME ,DATE_FORMAT(UDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') U_DATE ,UDATE ,IDX ,TABNAME ,NULL AS LATITUDE ,NULL AS LONGITUDE ,NULL AS THUMBNAIL ,NULL AS ORIGINNAME ,NULL AS XMLDATA ,'GeoCMS' AS DATAKIND ,SHARETYPE FROM GEOCMS_BOARD_CONTENT WHERE 1 = 1
AND (TITLE LIKE '%${text}%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%${text}%')
UNION
SELECT ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,FILENAME ,DATE_FORMAT(UDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') U_DATE ,UDATE ,IDX ,TABNAME ,LATITUDE ,LONGITUDE ,NULL AS THUMBNAIL ,NULL AS ORIGINNAME ,XMLDATA ,'GeoPhoto' AS DATAKIND ,SHARETYPE FROM GEOCMS_IMAGE_CONTENT WHERE 1 = 1
AND (TITLE LIKE '%${text}%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%${text}%')
AND XMLDATA LIKE '%${text}%'
AND (TITLE LIKE '%${text}%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%${text}%'
OR XMLDATA LIKE '%${text}%'
)
UNION
SELECT ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,FILENAME ,DATE_FORMAT(UDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') U_DATE ,UDATE ,IDX ,TABNAME ,LATITUDE ,LONGITUDE ,THUMBNAIL ,ORIGINNAME ,XMLDATA ,'GeoVideo' AS DATAKIND ,SHARETYPE FROM GEOCMS_VIDEO_CONTENT WHERE 1 = 1
AND (TITLE LIKE '%${text}%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%${text}%')
AND XMLDATA LIKE '%${text}%'
AND (TITLE LIKE '%${text}%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%${text}%'
OR XMLDATA LIKE '%${text}%'
)
) TMPTABLE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ID = '${loginId}' OR (SELECT TYPE FROM geocms_user WHERE id = '${loginId}') = 'ADMIN' OR SHARETYPE = 1 OR ( SHARETYPE = 2 AND '${loginId}' IN ( SELECT ID FROM GEOCMS_SHARE LEFT JOIN GEOCMS_USER ON GEOCMS_USER.UID = GEOCMS_SHARE.UID WHERE SHAREKIND = TMPTABLE.DATAKIND AND SHAREIDX = TMPTABLE.IDX ) ) ) ORDER BY UDATE DESC LIMIT ${display}
